title: only one light is in some circumtances visible for new config sophisticated_engineering_x4_config_1

content.raw:
Our new config `sophisticated_engineering_x4_config_1` should be a copy of the `x4_config_5` robot with only changes in the lights cone angle and the camera position. During the review of the pull request, we were asked to make changes to the lights regarding the shadow parameters. Testing now the new config the lights cannot be allways seen. 

Tested with catkin Workspace:

1. old config `x4_config_5`: Lights are visible.

`ign launch -v 4 urban_circuit.ign circuit:=urban worldName:=simple_urban_01 robotName1:=X4n1 robotConfig1:=x4_sensor_config_5`

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2002398551-Bildschirmfoto_von_2019-12-17_22-13-22.png)
2\. new config `sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_1` : light is only visible in the image view and only one of the three lights is shining.

`ign launch -v 4 urban_circuit.ign circuit:=urban worldName:=simple_urban_01 robotName1:=X4n1 robotConfig1:=sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_1`

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/848103870-Bildschirmfoto_von_2019-12-17_22-10-14.png)
3\. new config with localmodel -parameter: no lights are visible

`ign launch -v 4 urban_circuit.ign circuit:=urban worldName:=simple_urban_01 robotName1:=X4n1 robotConfig1:=sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_1 localModel:=true` 

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2251174337-Bildschirmfoto_von_2019-12-17_22-18-14.png)
Does this have to do with the shadow parameter? Or is there anything else changed by mistake?
content.html:
Our new config sophisticated_engineering_x4_config_1 should be a copy of the x4_config_5 robot with only changes in the lights cone angle and the camera position. During the review of the pull request, we were asked to make changes to the lights regarding the shadow parameters. Testing now the new config the lights cannot be allways seen.

Tested with catkin Workspace:

  1. old config x4_config_5: Lights are visible.

ign launch -v 4 urban_circuit.ign circuit:=urban worldName:=simple_urban_01 robotName1:=X4n1 robotConfig1:=x4_sensor_config_5

2. new config sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_1 : light is only visible in the image view and only one of the three lights is shining.

ign launch -v 4 urban_circuit.ign circuit:=urban worldName:=simple_urban_01 robotName1:=X4n1 robotConfig1:=sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_1

3. new config with localmodel -parameter: no lights are visible

ign launch -v 4 urban_circuit.ign circuit:=urban worldName:=simple_urban_01 robotName1:=X4n1 robotConfig1:=sophisticated_engineering_x4_sensor_config_1 localModel:=true

Does this have to do with the shadow parameter? Or is there anything else changed by mistake?
